Package controller

Class ModifyAppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Login
      • controller.MainMenu
        • controller.AddAppointmentController
          • controller.ModifyAppointmentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ModifyAppointmentController
extends AddAppointmentController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class has the methods for Modifying Appointments.

    The AppointmentsController extends the AddAppointmentController class and implements the Initializable interface. It has methods that allow the user to change and update appointment elements.

    • Method Detail

      • hasAppointmentsAtTime

        public boolean hasAppointmentsAtTime​(int id,
                                     int appointmentID,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        The method returns a boolean based on if the customer already has a meeting at the purposed meeting time.

        The method checks on 3 major things: Is the purposed start less than or equal to the start time that the customer already has and is the purposed end time greater than the appointment the customer is already in. Is the purposed start time after an appointment end time and is the purposed end time before or equal to anything that the customer is already booked in. Last check is, out side the window. Is one appoint between another.

        Parameters:
        id - the customer od
        appointmentID - the appointment id
        start - the start time
        end - the end time
        Returns:
        boolean

      • setAppointment

        public void setAppointment​(Appointment meeting)
        The method sets up the appointment that was selected on the prior stage. This method takes all of the elements that are changeable by the user and sets them to the modify stage.
        Parameters:
        meeting - selected meeting

      • updateAppointment

        public void updateAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The method updates the appointment. This method does time checks to make that the input times are correct and are within business hours. It checks all input and then calls the updateAppointment from Appointment DAO and loads the updated appointment into the database.
        Parameters:
        event - on click
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - NullPointerException

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        The method initializes the methods for set up.

        This method sets up the information needed for the user to add an appointment using the interface Initializable which helps call the methods after the controller has been initialized after the root element has processed.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Overrides:
        initialize in class AddAppointmentController
        Parameters:
        location - The url used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the url is not known.
        resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
